Title: Advocate falls into well, drowns
Content: In a bizarre incident, K. R. Bakkiyam, Additional District Public Prosecutor drowned, when he and his advocate friend, returning home in a two-wheeler fell into a roadside well at Samiyarpatti Vilakku
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: In a bizarre incident, K. R. Bakkiyam, Additional District Public Prosecutor drowned, when he and his advocate friend, returning home in a two-wheeler fell into a roadside well at Samiyarpatti Vilakku
